title: Would like link in site navigation to the ManifoldCF project
description: The Solr/Lucene site points to lots of other Apache projects.  It would be nice if it also pointed to ManifoldCF.

comments.author: Karl Wright
comments.content: Patch for site reference to ManifoldCF

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Checked in on trunk, not yet deployed to live site
